Name: Sudden Way
About the game: Sudden Way is a fun and unusual platformer with modern pixel graphics and simple controls. Take the hero through an unknown and dangerous world full of mysteries and dangerous traps. Fight with a cunning boss who manages the portals. Because of him, the hero was away from home. Pixel-art graphics are inspired by the best masterpieces of classic arcade games. Retro pixel style and color palette give the game extraordinary charm. It used all the many years of world experience in creating the best platformers. The game soundtrack takes a special place. These are high-quality compositions in the style of classical hip-hop music. It makes the gameplay incredibly stylish and cool. It's what the old retro games were so lacking. So all this is in the game. Test yourself and your gaming skills! Go through the different levels to the boss! Time to go on the adventure! Featuring: • 25 varied levels • Battle with boss • Awesome gameplay similar to retro-classic games • Cute pixel-art graphics • Classic hip-hop music • Awesome sound effects • Intuitive and simple controls • Gamepad supported • Multiple lives implemented in v 1.1
